definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: south (poet. & late) (on formation cf. Ol:§ 216 a Sta:§ 295)—[[דָּרוֹם]] Job 37:17 + 14 t. + Ez Eze 40:27 b, Eze 40:28 b (del. SyrVer Co in v:Eze 40:27 b; AB Vulgate Co in v:Eze 40:28 b—south, Ez Eze 42:18 (over against [[קָדִים]], [[חָפוֹן]], [[יׇם]]); 12 t. more in Ezek. (of wh. Co del. 2, cf. supr.) Eze 21:2 (= [[תֵּימָנׇה]] and [[נֶגֶב]]); ´[[דֶּרֶךְ הַדּ]] toward south Eze 40:24, Eze 40:24, Eze 40:27, rd. also ´[[דֶּרֶךְ הַדּ]] Eze 42:10 for [[הַקָּדִים]] ´[[ד]] LXX Ke Co; ´[[שַׁעַר הַדּ]] south gate Eze 40:27, Eze 40:28, Eze 40:28 cf. Co supr., Eze 40:44 (opp. [[חפון]]; also [[קדים]]), v:Eze 40:45 (opp. [[חפון]]) Eze 42:12 = ´[[לַדָּ]] Eze 41:11 (opp. [[חפון]]), ´[[לִשְׁכוֹת הד]] Eze 42:13 (opp. [[חפון]]). Elsewhere only De 33:23 (‖[[יַם]]), Job 37:17; Ec 1:6, Ec 11:3 (both opp. [[חפון]]).
